Mike Anderson is the sports editor at The Statesman PERIOD He is a senior majoring in journalism with aspirations of becoming a sports journalist PERIOD His love of sports comes from his time spent as a baseball player PERIOD As a reporter for The Statesman he has covered baseball softball football mens and womens basketball mens and womens soccer mens and womens lacrosse womens volleyball and hockey PERIOD He has also interned at Axcess Sports as a high school and college baseball and softball reporter PERIOD He is a local product from Port Jefferson N.Y PERIOD and is a diehard Mets Jets Nets and Islanders fan PERIOD
